Hey there! My name is

Alessandro Chinchilla

I'm a passionate front-end developer based in San Salvador, El Salvador. Always looking to create the best experiences and good looking websites for users. Moving with discipline and love for what I do, always making sure to deliver the best possible solution and learn something new everyday.

I'm a believer of life-long learning, besides programming and tech, I like playing chess, reading and running. Oh, and I am a huge music lover as well!
